column1: Uchi////The food here is so delish
column3: nothing you have ever had before.  They really take their dishes to another level.  If you want to just eat sushi/sashimi or specialty rolls
column4: you can get that somewhere else.  You come here to taste the other novelty stuff.  My favorite place by far and have eaten there 3 times already.  Can't wait to go back. Staff is great.  Too bad they cannot accomodate large parties.  Food is worth the wait.
